item.title: While Loops and Functions
item.description: In this session, we will learn about a new type of loop: a while loop! We will compare this loop with the previously learned “for loop”, and understand the key differences between them, and when we would want to use each one.

item.title: Lists and For Loops
item.description: In this session, we will learn about lists, and what makes them different than the variables we have previously learned about.

item.title: If, Elif, Else statements and Logical Operators
item.description: In this session, we will learn about how we can use elif and else statements in our if statements to add extra functionality to our code.

item.title: Variables and If-Statements
item.description: In this session, we will take a deeper look into using variables in our programs by exploring variable scope, combining variables, and a new data type: booleans!

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: In this session, we will get set up on our coding platform, take a look at what programming is, and begin writing our first lines of code!
